author: Andy Pearson
method: Pour the two rums, the coconut cream, pineapple juice and chunks of pineapple into a blender and blend until smooth. To serve, pour into a cocktail glass and garnish with pineapple leaves and a maraschino cherry.
ingredients: 35ml/1Â¼fl oz gold rum ,  1 tbsp coconut-flavoured rum,  50ml/2fl oz coconut cream ,  50ml/2fl oz pineapple juice ,  3-4 pineapple chunks,  2 pineapple leaves ,  1 maraschino cherry
